products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra blackout sunburst yellow electric roller blind in yellow. Made to measure from 123.62 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their vitra blackout sunburst yellow fabric is a stunning, bright but subtle shade of yellow, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors. This shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades but will also compliment natural wooden tones. A real all rounder. 
 
Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style. 
 
This child-safe, electric roller blind can be upgrade for use with smart phones, amazon alexa and google home hub devices. At swift direct blinds, not only is this electric roller blind made by their expert team, but it also comes with a free five year gurarantee!
 
 Product id: db-erbx2210 fabric colour: sunburst yellow material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
